description: '''Krushclub''' is a subgenre of sigilkore, originating in the early 2020s, mixing [[Jersey club]] elements with electronic sound qualities, known for its energetic sound and catchy beats. Similar to [[Glitchcore]], it has gained prominence throughout various social media platforms such as TikTok, Instagram and YouTube. The term "krush" comes from a digital audio effect named a [[bitcrusher]].
